artist: Artist: Torii Kiyonaga; Publisher: Nishimuraya Yohachi
catalogue_raissonne: Torii Kiyonaga sakuhin sōmokuroku Chiba 2007, no. 97
creditline: Gift of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
text: The actors Matsumoto Kōshirō IV as Azuma no Yoshirō, Nakamura Nakazō I as Naniwa no Jirosaku, and Matsumoto Yonesaburō I as kamuro Tayori in the premiere of the play "Modori kago iro ni aikata" 戻駕色相肩 (A Harlot's Love in a Returning Palanquin), performed at the Nakamura Theater in the 11th lunar month of 1788.
title: Actors Matsumoto Kōshirō IV as Azuma no Yoshirō (R), Nakamura Nakazō I as Naniwa no Jirosaku (L), and Matsumoto Yonesaburō I as kamuro Tayori (C)
